entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
